data.title: M_-M_K-: Estimate masses and uncertainties from M_Ks (2MASS Ks + distance)
data.name: M_-M_K-
data.description: Code for estimating realistic masses and uncertainties from M_Ks (2MASS Ks + distance)

evidence: README mentions binaries/installers: "You can also download the input data used to derive this relation (orbits, distances, masses, etc.) from the [ancillary folder on arXiv](https://arxiv.org/src/1811.06938v2/anc) or in the [full version"
"This code is meant to provide realistic masses and uncertainties of (single) low-mass stars given a user-provided 2MASS Ks and distance (and uncertainties)."
"How to run: Maybe you want to know the mass of GJ1214 (python syntax): ... from mk_mass import posterior"
